select B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( select rank_cnt "rankCnt", cnt "cnt", b.book_title "bookTitle", b.book_loc "bookLoc" from book b ,( select rank() over(order by cnt desc) rank_cnt, cnt, isbn from ( select count(*) cnt, isbn from rental where to_char(rental_date, 'yyyy/mm') = #{day} group by isbn)) r where rank_cnt <= 5 and r.isbn = b.isbn )A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} and #{last}
